author: Madurai Bureau
text:
Devotees pulling the car of Madhusoodhana Perumal temple at Parakkai near Nagercoil on Tuesday.

Thousands of devotees thronged temples across the district on the auspicious day of Panguni Uthiram and offered special prayers to fulfil their wishes. Arulmigu Subramaniya Swamy Temple at Tiruchendur was kept open since early morning.

The celestial wedding between of Lord Murugan with Goddess Sri Valli took place. Vishwaroopa Deepa Aradhanai was performed between 4.30 a.m. and at 5.30 a.m., sources said.

Nagercoil

The car of the Parakkai Madhusoodhana Perumal temple was pulled by the devotees with religious fervour to mark the Panguni festival. The presiding deities were taken through Mada Veedhi by a decorated car.

The festival began with flag-hoisting on March 14. Theppathiruvizha was held in the temple tank on Wednesday night.
title: Panguni Uthiram celebrated
